annotations.description: The Fix was first published by Jerry Thomas in the first edition of "How To Mix Drinks" published in 1862. It definitely predated Thomas, but, again, he gets...
annotations.title: Master The Classics: Brandy Fix

textContent:
2oz (60ml) Brandy
.75oz (22.5ml) Simple Syrup
.75oz (22.5ml) Lemon Juice
Orange Wedge
Luxardo Cherry

Shake and pour over crushed ice. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t5L_0R7Ovhc
title: Brandy Fix
